1: <pb/><e>Bitz tu'n David tej tel ok twitz Absalón aju tcy'ajal</e> <pb/><t>Nman Dios, ma che chmet-xix ke aj k'oj wi'je, nimxix ke xjal in jaw cyi'n cyib wi'je,</t>
2: <t>nimcu xjal in che yolin wi'je ex in cyma'n: Mlay clet jlu tu'n Dios, che chi.</t>
3: <t>Atzun teya Nman, aya colol wi'je, aya in jaw nimsante weye ex aya in tzaj cyuwsante nc'u'je.</t>
4: <pb/><t>Tu'n tk'ajk'ajel nwi'ye cyuw in xi nkanine onbil te Kman, ex in chin tzaj tzak'we'ne tu'n max twi witz xjan aju etzan tu'n.</t>
5: <t>In chin cub coẍe'ye ex in tzaj nwatle ex nne'l nwatle, nok tu'nju ate Kman tzyulte weye.</t>
6: <t>Mlay chin xobe cywitz nok jte' mil xjal cytxolin cyib wi'jele banin cyten tu'n cyoc tzokpaj wi'je.</t>
7: <pb/><t>We'ctza Nman. Chin tcloma Nman Dios. Porque aya cbajel c'ixbisante cyk'o'tx cycyakil aj k'oj wi'je; cbajel tbuchina twitz cye' ke xjal mya ba'n.</t>
8: <t>Tu'na at colbil Nman, cy'iwlama aju tnam etzan tu'na.</t>
